import React from "react"; import io from "socket.io-client"; function Game({ name1, name2, value }) { const socket = io(); const buttonClicked = (e) => { let value = document.getElementById("value").innerText; e.innerText = value; Socket.emit }; return (

You: {name1}

Opponent: {name2}


You are playing as {value}


X's Turn



); } export default Game;
